faqs.question: How do I apply a coupon?
faqs.answer: Enter the coupon code at checkout to get the discount.

faqs.question: Can I use multiple coupons?
faqs.answer: No, only one coupon can be applied per order unless specified otherwise.

faqs.question: Why isnâ€™t my coupon working?
faqs.answer: Check if the coupon is valid, applicable on selected items, and not expired.

faqs.question: Do discounts apply on delivery charges?
faqs.answer: Typically, coupons apply to product prices only, not delivery fees.
